alert.note: Alert for Panola; Rusk; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 4:59PM CDT until April 26 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Panola County in northeastern Texas... Central Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Shelby County in eastern Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Henderson, moving southeast at 40 mph. Golfball sized hail was reported earlier with this storm. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Carthage, Pinehill, Minden, Joinerville, Gary City, Chapman, Dotson, Church Hill, Lawsonville, Fairplay and Brachfield. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
